about_the_game:
🚂 Welcome Aboard Shirley: The Future of PvP Survival! 🚂


Dear Passengers

Ready to board Shirley, the last bastion of civilization in a ravaged world? As your Head of Hospitality, I'll guide you through this journey of survival and betrayal, where every choice shapes the fate of the train and its inhabitants.

Start in Third Class

Where every meal is a fight for survival. Discover culinary 'delights' like Stuffed Mushrooms and Rusty Roach Surprise, recipes born from necessity and ingenuity in this desolate world.

Climb to Power

Fight, negotiate, or deceive to advance through the train's social classes. Reach the locomotive and seize control. Will you be a tyrannical conductor or a magnanimous leader?

A Social Survival Sandbox

Every alliance is fragile, every betrayal has a cost. Build, hunt for resources, and survive in a world where every interaction could be your last.

"In Project Coltrane, every player writes their own story. Every moment can lead to triumph or tragedy. Your skill, ingenuity, and survival instincts will determine your fate."

Make Shirley Your Home

  • Construct bases
  • Craft weapons
  • Craft gear
  • Participate in uprisings
  • Lead revolts!

Become a master craftsman, a cunning thief, or a ruthless marauder.




🚂 Join Project Coltrane Now! 🚂

Signed,
Head of Coltrane
Hospitality Manager

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violent content with the presence of blood, as well as voice chat support.

short_description: In a desolate world, board colossal trains, civilization's remnants. Start from the rear, ascending the social ladder, and aim to control as the conductor. Your choices, cunning or ruthless, shape the train's fate in this PvP survival game. Serve the Train!
